title: What are some creative Spotify playlist names? - Quora

response.answer_text: I love to name my playlists random yet somehow relevant names so here’s some of my favorites: Bangers and Mash: the playlist with all the bops. Mine is filled predominantly British music, so that’s a bonus.Mellow Yellow: the nice calming songs.Therapy is Expensive: the sadboi hours songs. WARNING: may make sadboi hours worse. Use with caution.Flutter: the love songs that make your heart soar.Birks With Socks: the ~dad~ bops. You know, Queen, the Beatles, Hall and Oates. That type of thing.Rad/Grunge/Groovy: the [insert decade] playlist. Take a slang term from that decade, insert a bunch of songs you like from said decade, boom. Ya gotchaself a playlist.Hawyee: the country playlist. Honorable mention: I <3 my sisterYa like Jazz?: An homage to Barry B. Benson, one of the greatest protagonists of film. Fill this sucker up with, you know, jazz.Russian Roulette: the playlist with beautiful pieces of classical music, with a couple of crass, vulgar, and hilariously offbeat songs in the mix.Screlting: the songs you just belt (scream) out by heart.Alright Alright Alright: the feel-good, motivating, “look at me now” songs.Alrighty, I’m spent. Hopefully some of these names sparked inspiration for your next playlist. Happy Listening, Rebecca

I took this from one of my old answers because I answered a question that was similar to this. I'll add a few though. Sad tunes playlistSongs to rock out toThis is life I guessBest of ___ (insert artist)FAVORITE TRACKS OF ALL TIMEMy favorite tunesFavorite songs of all timeBoogie playlistSongs to make you danceInstrumental playlistTHIS IS ME!Self-expressive songsOkay___ (MBTI type) jamsLove songsCheery tunesHappy tunesRainy DaySunny DayRelateable songRelaxing tunesOh reallyLonelinessBroken to piecesHelp……save…me…BopsCry yourself to sleepThe best possible combination of songsPrayingMeaning of LifeClean up songsPopped balloonPretty LiesChildhood memoriesDancing to the beatBest songs of my lifeBest days of my lifeTypical SchooldayWell, here ya go…
